segments.text: This kitchen is such a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and the woman is ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how she's just drying that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it's going to be such a slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined by all that water streaming down them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet this is going to be such a big cleanup job later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids are making it worse by sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to leave crumbs everywhere, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and fix this before it gets even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
